title: Reiten: Pipping Arsenal to WSL title would 'mean everything'
shortDescription: Chelsea's Guro Reiten, who could make her own history this week, tells Sky Sports why pipping Arsenal to the WSL title this season would be so special.

title: Southgate unsure what Qatar boycott would achieve
shortDescription: Gareth Southgate has questioned what England would achieve by boycotting this year's World Cup due to human rights issues in Qatar.

title: Magill: The Everton and Northern Ireland trailblazer aiming for more success
shortDescription: Simone Magill has had a trailblazing career for both Everton Women and Northern Ireland Women despite only being 27, but has plenty more milestones in her sights.

title: FA providing 100 free buses for Man City-Liverpool fans going to semi-final
shortDescription: The FA will provide 100 free buses for Liverpool and Manchester City fans travelling to Wembley for their FA Cup semi-final.

title: Boehly, Broughton bids both on Chelsea shortlist
shortDescription: Sir Martin Broughton and Todd Boehly have had their bids shortlisted in the auction to buy Chelsea with the Ricketts family confident of making the shortlist.

title: Luxembourg vs N Ireland preview: Baraclough without trio
shortDescription: Paddy McNair, Conor Bradley and Bailey Peacock-Farrell have been ruled out of Northern Ireland's friendly against Luxembourg on Friday.

title: When are ePremier League 2021/22 Grand Finals?
shortDescription: The ePremier League 2021/22 Grand Finals take place on March 26 and 27 and you can watch all the action on Sky Sports...

title: Everton fan handed four-year ban for throwing bottle at Cash
shortDescription: A 19-year-old Everton fan has been handed a four-year banning order after admitting to assaulting Aston Villa's Matty Cash with a plastic bottle thrown from his seat.

title: Coyle to return to management at Queen's Park
shortDescription: Queen's Park have announced that Owen Coyle will officially join the Spiders as their new head coach in June.

title: Skinner: We must put on Old Trafford show
shortDescription: Man Utd boss Marc Skinner has emphasised he wants the team to put on an eye-catching display in Sunday's historic Women's Super League clash with Everton.

title: WSL: Chelsea's chance to finally go top
shortDescription: After having their chance to topple leaders Arsenal called off in midweek due to a Covid outbreak at Tottenham, will Chelsea finally leap to the WSL summit this weekend?

title: WSL: Arsenal vs Tottenham postponed due to Covid cases
shortDescription: Arsenal have confirmed Saturday's Women's Super League match against Tottenham has been postponed due to a Covid outbreak in the Spurs camp.

title: Baldock wins Championship Goal of the Month
shortDescription: Sheffield United defender George Baldock has won the Sky Bet Championship Goal of the Month award for February.

title: McCoist: Old Firm defeat for Rangers unthinkable | In-form Ramsey key
shortDescription: The former Rangers striker and manager says a defeat for his old side next week would spell the end of their title charge.

title: Bale hits out at 'disgusting' Spanish press headlines: 'They should be ashamed'
shortDescription: Gareth Bale called press headlines in Spain that took a swipe at him "disgusting" after his two goals against Austria put Wales within one win of reaching the World Cup.

title: Rep Ireland vs Belgium preview: Parrott's pitch
shortDescription: Republic of Ireland striker Troy Parrott has been challenged to reap the rewards of his hard work after realising he was only going to get "one shot" at making it.

title: Fernandes to sign new five-year deal | 'Strange timing from Man United'
shortDescription: Bruno Fernandes is on the verge of signing a new five-year contract with Manchester United on hugely-improved terms.

title: View from Italy after World Cup failure: 'The disaster of Mancini'
shortDescription: The World Cup will be without Italy for the second edition in a row following what has been described back home as a "humiliating" defeat to North Macedonia.

title: Road to Qatar 2022: Salah vs Mane in AFCON final rematch
shortDescription: We take a look at the race to qualify for Qatar 2022 across the world - and the box office play-off between Liverpool stars Mohamed Salah and Sadio Mane.

title: Papers: Wolves winger Neto added to PSG wishlist
shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Friday's national newspapers...
